item.title: GPG Key Transition Statement
item.description: I have created a new GPG Key 0x944E36F397047609 and will be transitioning away from my old key. I have also learned that ProtonMail (my provider) requires a primary key for management. As this is not something I am willing to give them, there will be a mismatch between my keys for email and everything else. You can find my new ProtonMail public key here. If you have signed my previous key I would appreciate signatures on my new key as well.

item.title: New Website!
item.description: After many years of owning www.patrickcking.com and really doing nothing with it, I’ve decided that it’s time to make use of this domain. This decision comes as a time when I am preparing to leave all social media websites and I am trying to find the least disruptive way to do so. The main drive to build this site is for my contact and event pages which I hope will allow me to keep in touch with my friends and continue to organize parties.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Below are my preferred contact methods in order of preference. Most of them are end to end encrypted allowing for greater privacy for both users. Matrix: @patrick:patrickcking.chat Signal: +15038054667 E-Mail: patrick@patrickcking.com Please use PGP/MIME. My ProtonMail email public key can be found here. Keybase: keybase://chat/king SMS Text Message Phone Calls Other forms of communication should be encrypted with my GPG public key (0x944E36F397047609) if you want our communication to remain private.

item.title: Events
item.description: As I’m deploying this website we are still in the middle of the Covid-19 pandemic so I haven’t finished this page yet. However, eventually there will sign-up form here so you can be emailed whenever I host and event or party! This page’s markdown can be verified with this signature and it’s HTML can be verified with this signature.
